all_answers.question: Polygenic inheritance definition biology
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: Polygenic of or relating to an inheritable character that is controlled by several genes at once of a related to or determined by polygenes. Genetic science, genetics- the branch of biology that studies heredity and variation in organisms.
